biotools.summary: Tool for advanced analysis of biological networks. Given two biological networks, it seeks a set of modules, each representing strongly connected nodes in the first network, that are also strongly interconnected in the second network.

bioschemas.name: ModMap
bioschemas.summary: Tool for advanced analysis of biological networks. Given two biological networks, it seeks a set of modules, each representing strongly connected nodes in the first network, that are also strongly interconnected in the second network.
